parameters.name: DataQualityEvaluationTaskId
parameters.description: The ID of the data quality monitoring task that is associated with the rule.

parameters.name: DataQualityRuleIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the monitoring rules.

parameters.name: ProjectId
parameters.description: The ID of the DataWorks workspace. You can log on to the [DataWorks console](https://workbench.data.aliyun.com/console) and go to the workspace configuration page to obtain the workspace ID.
